participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and independent, Ella loves exploring the outdoors and spending time with her family. She is a free spirit who enjoys road trips and discovering new places.
participant_1.background: I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets. Before my current job I was a dog trainer. I love the mild weather in Portland. I have a wife and two kids. I wash my clothes when they start to stink from all the road trips.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and observant, Linda finds joy in the little things and has a curious nature. She enjoys listening to the world around her and cherishes moments with her family.
participant_2.background: I am a middle-aged woman who lives in New Mexico with my dog and cat. I spend my days working and taking care of my family, but my favorite time of day is when I sneak out into the night to listen in on my neighbors' arguments. There's only been one set of twins in my family. My mother is a teacher. I don't know how to swim.

content.text: Hi there! Where are you from?
Portland, Oregon.  I've always wanted to visit the Grand Canyon.
I've never been, but I've heard it's amazing!  What do you do for a living?
I'm a dog trainer, but I'm looking for a new job.  What about you?
I'm a stay at home mom, but I used to work as a teacher.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I have two kids, but I don't have the time to stay at home with them.
It's definitely a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is.  So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I love to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time.  I like to go hiking and biking.
I've never been hiking, but I've always wanted to try it.  Maybe we could go together sometime.
That would be fun!  I know a great trail in the mountains near here.
